review_blob:
0,33 l bottle, bought by my girlfriend from Be Hoppy, Madrid.

The advice of sellers "this is a beer for 4-5 persons; dont drink it alone!" made the beer more interesting. So i tried it with some friends. Too spicy for them! The head was represented by some seeds and a piece of chili. It has a special aroma of chocolate cakes, gold raisins, baked apples, alcohol and brown sugar. In its very first moment it has an intense taste of chocolate, smoked paprika, dry soil and roasted malt, but after two or three seconds all of this are covered by an intense hot sensation, amplified by a high carbonation. Its body is medium to full with a long aftertaste and "red afterface" for my friends. This beer was really different

330 ml bottle, from Auchan.

That IPA was extraordinary!!!

I love Thwaites!

0.5 l can, from Auchan.

Golden colour, clear liquid, no head. 

Aroma has notes of malt, butter, sugar syrup, hops.

Bitter taste, average carbonation, oily texture, medium body.

0,5 l bottle, from Auchan.

Clear cooper liquid with a long creamy beige head.

Aroma has notes of malt, elder flowers, dried figs, raisins, linden flowers honey, dried banana, butter biscuits.

Full body, bittersweet taste, oily texture, average carbonation, bitter finish, long aftertaste. Very well balanced.

0.33 l bottle, from Auchan.

Dark burgundy liquid, with a short creamy beige head.

Aroma has notes of roses, sour cherries, brown sugar, peach, noble yeast.

Full body, bittersweet taste, thin and creamy texture, with a lively carbonation and an astringent finish.
beer_name: La Bire du Boucanier Dark Ale

review_blob:
Draught @ Best Beer Fest, in Bucharest.

Clear amber liquid with a beautiful white head.

Aroma has notes of bitter cherries, dry soil, grepfruit, malt, chocolate, orange peel, brown sugar.

Full body, bittersweet taste, creamy texture, lively carbonation, astringent finish.

Medium body, bitter taste, average carbonation, long finish.

Clear burgundy liquid with a long beige head.

Aroma has notes of dried plums, raisins, honey, yeast, fresh bread, butter biscuits, noble alcohol, brown sugar.

Full body, creamy texture, average carbonation, bittersweet taste, bitter aftertaste. The alcohol is hidden very well.

review_blob:
0.5 l can.

Cloudy liquid, pale yellow colour, minimal white head.

Aroma has notes of honey, lemon, butter biscuits.

Medium sweet and light sour taste, light body, thin texture,  fizzy carbonation, bittersweet malty finish. Very refreshing

Golden colour, clear liquid, medium sized white head.

Aroma has notes of malt, fresh bread, boiled corn.

Light body, watery texture, bittersweet taste, almost no finish.

Pale golden colour, clear liquid, long white head.

Aroma has notes of malt, hops, grass, fresh bread.

Bittersweet taste with yeasty hints, average carbonation, medium body, long finish. Very refreshing.

0.33 l bottle.

Clear amber liquid with a short white head.

Aroma has notes of malt, brown sugar, alcohol, hops, walnut leaves.

Medium body, bittersweet taste, watery texture, average carbonation, flat finish.

review_blob:

The taste is bitter, the body is full, the carbonation is average. It has a licorice texture and a bittersweet aftertaste.
